Uses of Class
logic.Actor

  • Packages that use Actor 
    Package Description
    logic  

    • Uses of Actor in logic

      Subclasses of Actor in logic 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Camera
      The camera follows a target.
      class  Chalice
      The Chalice is the object, which the player has to get to.
      class  EmptyTile
      The empty tile is like "air".
      class  Enemy
      An enemies goal is to kill the player.
      class  EnemySpawner
      Spawns an enemy periodically at its position.
      class  Entity
      An entity has health management and damage.
      class  GroundTile
      The ground prevents the entities to infinitely fall, giving them a solid ground to walk on.
      class  Movable
      A class which extend the Movable class, will have a velocity vector attached to it.
      class  PistolBullet
      A player shot bullet which damages enemies if it hit them, cannot penetrate walls (gets destroyed by them).
      class  Player
      The player is controlled by the user.
      class  PlayerSpawn
      The player spawn on a game map defines where the player spawns on the start of the game.
      class  Tile 
      Fields in logic declared as Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Actor Camera.target
      The camera follows the target, everywhere it goes.
      Fields in logic with type parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Actor> GameMap.actors
      The actors on the map.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Actor> GameMap.actorsToAdd
      Actors to add after an update cycle ends not interrupting the cycle.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Actor> GameMap.actorsToRemove
      Actors to remove after an update cycle ends not interrupting the cycle.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Actor> Entity.collided
      The actors which this entity was colliding since this moment.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Actor> Entity.colliding
      The actors which this entity is colliding at the moment.
      Methods in logic that return Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Actor Camera.getTarget()
      Getting the current target of the camera.
      Methods in logic that return types with arguments of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Actor> GameMap.getActors() 
      java.util.List<Actor> Actor.getCollidingActors()
      Gets the actors on the game map, which collision box intersects this actor's collision box.
      Methods in logic with parameters of type Actor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameMap.addActor(Actor a)
      Directly add an actor to the scene list.
      void GameMap.addActorToBuffer(Actor a)
      Add the actor to a buffer not to interrupt the current update cycle.
      void GameMap.removeActor(Actor a)
      Directly remove an actor from the scene list.
      void GameMap.removeActorFromBuffer(Actor a)
      Add the actor to a buffer not to interrupt the current update cycle.
      void Camera.setTarget(Actor target)
      Setting the target to follow.
